amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress regarding the implementation of the Congressionally-mandated recommendations of the Institute of Medicine study.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 62 printed in House Report 111-498 to express a Sense of Congress concerning the implementation of the Congressionally-mandated recommendations of the Institute of Medicine study.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McMahon amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
